title: Crashes Take Toll at Vuelta a España: Riccitello, Urán, Yates Among Victims on Slick Spanish Roads
content:
Crashes send three more riders home, including Colombia's Urán racing his 25th and final grand tour of his legendary career.

Read the full article at Crashes Take Toll at Vuelta a España: Riccitello, Urán, Yates Among Victims on Slick Spanish Roads on Velo.
author: ahood
